data.text: @Hope4ChgNow @MaxSkyler1 @DavidWaddell5 @NASCAR I don't watch it but was quite impressed with the reverence, and in awe of asking people to remove hats/anthem and praying we need to follow
@DavidWaddell5 Someone called today and said turn your TV on, I was shocked to NASCAR fans removing hats, drivers, crews and fans stand for Anthe & PRAY!
